020import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
022import redis.clients.jedis.BinaryJedisPubSub;
023
024import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
025
026/**
027 * TNESubscriber
028 *
029 * @author creatorfromhell
030 * @since 0.1.2.0
031 */
032public class TNESubscriber extends BinaryJedisPubSub {
033
034  @Override
035  public void onMessage(byte[] channel, byte[] message) {
036    super.onMessage(channel, message);
037
038    final String channelStr = new String(channel, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
039
040    PluginCore.log().debug("Redis Message Received: " + channelStr, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
041    PluginCore.instance().getChannelMessageManager().handle(channelStr, message);
042  }
043}
